tool_description: Collects threat intelligence data from multiple sources including commercial feeds, government sources, and industry sharing platforms.

feed_sources.description: List of threat intelligence feed sources to collect from

collection_timeframe.description: Time range for data collection in ISO 8601 format

data_types.description: Types of threat data to collect (IOCs, TTPs, malware, campaigns)

error_messages: Invalid feed source: One or more feed sources are not accessible or do not exist
Authentication failure: Unable to authenticate with one or more threat intelligence feeds
Invalid timeframe: Collection timeframe must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time string
Unsupported data type: One or more specified data types are not supported by the selected feeds
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests to threat intelligence feeds
usage: Specify feed sources, timeframe, and data types to collect threat intelligence. Optionally set classification level for proper data handling.

collection_summary.description: Summary of data collection results and statistics

raw_threat_data.description: Raw threat intelligence data entries collected from feeds

feed_status.description: Status of each feed source during collection
